item.title: 数字资产淘金热吸引贷款人，SoFi 推出加密货币交易
item.description: SoFi周二宣布，计划为客户推出加密货币交易，因为在监管更加明确和采用率不断提高的情况下，价值数万亿美元的加密货币行业继续吸引着传统金融公司。【原文：SoFi on Tuesday announced plans to roll out crypto trading for customers, as the multi-trillion-dollar crypto sector continues to attract traditional financial firms amid clearer regulation and growing adoption.】

item.title: 桑坦德数字贷款公司 Openbank 在西班牙推出加密货币交易
item.description: 桑坦德数字贷款公司 Openbank 周二表示，继竞争对手 BBVA 之后，该公司已在西班牙推出加密货币交易服务。【原文：Openbank, Santander's digital lender, said on Tuesday it had launched a cryptocurrency trading service in Spain, following rival BBVA .】

item.title: Target 将在节日期间降低 3,000 种日常用品的价格
item.description: 塔吉特（Target）零售商周二表示，该公司将在节日期间对食品、饮料和家庭必需品等 3000 种日常用品进行降价促销，以吸引在经济不确定因素影响下紧缩预算的购物者。【原文：Target is slashing prices on 3,000 everyday items such as food, beverages and household essentials during the holiday season, the retailer said on Tuesday, as it seeks to attract shoppers who are tightening budgets amid economic uncertainties.】

item.title: 人工智能云公司 Nebius 与 Meta 签订 30 亿美元协议，收入增长超过四倍
item.description: Nebius 集团与 Meta 公司签署了一项价值约 30 亿美元的协议，将在五年内为 Facebook 所有者提供人工智能基础设施。【原文：Nebius Group has signed a deal worth about $3 billion with Meta to provide the Facebook owner with AI infrastructure over a five-year period, the company said on Tuesday, after it reported a more than fourfold rise in third-quarter revenue.】

item.title: 最大的宜家零售商报告利润增长，努力吸引有预算意识的买家
item.description: 全球最大的宜家家具零售商宜家家居周二公布年度利润增长，同时试图挽回资金紧张的消费者，并表示由于吸收了部分关税成本，宜家在美国的提价幅度低于竞争对手。【原文：The world's biggest retailer of IKEA furniture reported a rise in annual profit on Tuesday, while it tries to bring back cash-strapped consumers, and said it had raised prices in the U.S. less than competitors as it absorbs some tariff costs.】

item.title: 李维斯将在更多门店销售价值 300 美元的牛仔裤，以满足对高档牛仔裤日益增长的需求
item.description: 李维斯（Levi's）首席财务与增长官哈米特-辛格（Harmit Singh）告诉路透社记者，李维斯明年将在更多的商店销售其价值 300 美元的新牛仔裤系列，因为该公司希望通过利用对高档牛仔裤的强劲需求来促进增长。【原文：Levi's will sell its new line of $300 jeans in more stores next year as it looks to boost growth by tapping into strong demand for premium denim, Chief Financial and Growth Officer Harmit Singh told Reuters.】

item.title: 早间竞价科技股反弹停滞
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，Meta 首席人工智能科学家 Yann LeCun 计划离职创办初创公司
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，Meta 公司的首席人工智能科学家 Yann LeCun 正计划离开这家社交媒体公司，成立自己的初创公司。【原文：Meta's chief artificial intelligence scientist Yann LeCun is planning to leave the social media company to set up his own startup, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 花旗银行：中国比亚迪的目标是在 2026 年向海外销售 160 万辆汽车
item.description: 花旗银行（Citi）周二在一份报告中称，中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪的目标是明年在海外销售 160 万辆汽车，从 2025 年起以两位数的高增长加倍拓展海外市场。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD aims to sell up to 1.6 million vehicles abroad next year, doubling down on overseas expansions with high double-digit growth from 2025, Citi said in a report on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，微软计划向葡萄牙人工智能数据中心投资 100 亿美元
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，微软将斥资 100 亿美元在葡萄牙海岸建造一个人工智能数据中心，这是微软今年在欧洲最大的投资项目之一。【原文：Microsoft will spend $10 billion on an artificial intelligence data center along the Portuguese coast, marking one of its largest European investments this year, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 挪威电信公司（Telenor）的目标是在 2030 年前实现北欧核心盈利低至中个位数增长
item.description: 挪威电信运营商挪威电信公司（Telenor）周二在投资者日之前表示，预计到2030年，该公司在北欧地区的有机核心收益将以每年低至中个位数的百分比增长。【原文：Norway's Telenor expects its organic core earnings from the Nordic region to grow by a low-to-mid single-digit percentage per year until 2030, the telecom operator said on Tuesday ahead of its investor day.】

item.title: 德国公民因在黑暗网络上对政客发出死亡威胁而被捕
item.description: 检察官周二表示，德国警方拘留了一名波兰裔德国公民，他被指控在暗网上运营一个煽动谋杀知名政治家的网站。【原文：German police have detained a Polish-German citizen accused of running a site on the dark web that agitated for the murder of prominent politicians, prosecutors said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 派拉蒙天舞公司股价攀升，流媒体赌注成为焦点
item.description: 派拉蒙 Skydance 股价上涨 5.5%，原因是这家新合并的媒体公司宣布削减更多成本，并计划向流媒体和制片厂部门投资 15 亿美元，从而提振了投资者对合并后首份财报的信心。【原文：Paramount Skydance shares rose 5.5% as the newly merged media firm announced more cost cuts and plans to invest $1.5 billion in its streaming and studio divisions, lifting investor confidence following its first results since the merger.】

item.title: 美国停摆的后果：谁胜出了？
item.description: 随着美国国会朝着达成协议结束美国政府史上最长停摆的方向迈进，路透社邀请了十几位策略师和分析师来评估在短期和长期内谁巩固了自己的地位，谁付出了代价。【原文：As the U.S. Congress moved toward a deal to end the longest U.S. government shutdown in history, Reuters asked a dozen strategists and analysts to assess who strengthened their position and who paid a price, in the short- and long-term.】

item.title: AMD 将在分析师日上概述人工智能芯片业务计划
item.description: 先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices）预计将于周二在纽约纳斯达克举行的金融分析师日上概述该公司的人工智能芯片和系统业务计划。【原文：Advanced Micro Devices is expected on Tuesday to outline the company's plans for its artificial intelligence chip and systems businesses at a financial analyst day at the Nasdaq in New York.】

item.title: 科技担忧再起，美国期货回落；联邦重开尚待时日
item.description: 华尔街期货周二下跌，市场对科技股估值过高的担忧再次出现，同时市场密切关注美国历史上最长政府停摆的进展情况。【原文：Wall Street futures fell on Tuesday with concerns around elevated technology valuations resurfacing, while markets closely watched progress toward the end of the longest government shutdown in U.S. history.】

item.title: 数据中心延迟影响年度收入预期，英伟达支持的 CoreWeave 公司股价下跌
item.description: CoreWeave 的股价在周二的盘前交易中暴跌近 9%，尽管该公司的人工智能服务需求强劲，但由于数据中心出现故障，该公司缩减了年度营收预期。【原文：CoreWeave's shares plunged nearly 9% in premarket trading on Tuesday after it scaled back its annual revenue forecast due to data center hiccups despite strong demand for its artificial intelligence services.】

item.title: 消息人士称，谷歌将在德国投资约 60 亿美元
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周二告诉路透社，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司将在德国投资约 50 亿欧元（约合 58 亿美元），以扩大其在欧洲最大经济体的基础设施和数据中心容量。【原文：Alphabet's Google will invest around 5 billion euros ($5.8 billion) in Germany, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday, in a push to expand its infrastructure and data centre capacity in Europe's largest economy.】

item.title: Reuters Next - 星展集团首席执行官表示，"解放日 "之后多元化更加迫切
item.description: 星展集团首席执行官陈苏山周二在接受路透社NEXT Newsmaker采访时表示，在美国于4月 "解放日 "宣布对来自各国的进口商品征收关税后，企业的多元化经营变得更加重要。【原文：DBS Group chief executive Tan Su Shan said it was more important for businesses to diversify after the U.S. announced tariffs on imports from countries on 'Liberation Day' in April, speaking at a Reuters NEXT Newsmaker interview on Tuesday.】

item.title: 全球证券监察机构称 "代币化 "带来新风险
item.description: 全球证券监管机构国际证监会组织（IOSCO）周二在一份报告中称，与主流金融资产挂钩的加密代币可能会给投资者带来新的风险，因为金融业对 "代币化 "的利弊仍存在分歧。【原文：Crypto tokens linked to mainstream financial assets could create new risks for investors, the global securities regulator IOSCO said in a report on Tuesday, as the finance industry remains split on the merits of "tokenization".】

item.title: 德国法院裁定，未经许可，OpenAI 不得使用歌词
item.description: 本周二，德国一家法院在一宗备受关注的版权案中支持该国音乐版权协会 GEMA，该协会起诉美国人工智能公司 OpenAI。【原文：A German court on Tuesday sided with the country's music rights society GEMA in a closely watched copyright case against U.S.-based artificial intelligence firm OpenAI.】

item.title: 欧洲央行研究发现：中国商品倾销始于关税之前
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）周二的一份研究报告认为，国内需求疲软而非美国加征关税是中国以最低价格向欧洲市场倾销过剩产品、牺牲国内生产商利益的主要原因。【原文：Weak domestic demand rather than U.S. tariffs is the main reason China is dumping surplus product on European markets at rock-bottom prices at the expense of domestic producers, a European Central Bank study argued on Tuesday.】

item.title: 印度金融科技公司 Pine Labs 的 4.4 亿美元首次公开募股在最后一天获得认购
item.description: 印度金融科技公司 Pine Labs 4.4 亿美元的首次公开募股（IPO）在周二投标的最后一天获得足额认购，尽管对盈利能力和估值的担忧让一些投资者望而却步。【原文：Indian fintech firm Pine Labs' $440 million IPO was fully subscribed on the final day of bidding on Tuesday, even as concerns over profitability and valuations kept some investors at bay.】

item.title: 阿斯利康创历史新高，巩固英国最大股票领先地位
item.description: 周二，阿斯利康的股价突破了 2024 年 9 月的最高点，创下历史新高，巩固了该公司作为英国市值最大上市股票的地位。【原文：Shares in AstraZeneca rose past their September 2024 peak on Tuesday, hitting a fresh record high and cementing the company's position as the largest UK-listed stock by market value.】

item.title: 瑞士制表商因对特朗普可能降低关税持乐观态度而上涨
item.description: 周二，历峰集团和斯沃琪集团股价上涨，此前美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他正与瑞士就降低瑞士面临的39%出口关税达成协议。【原文：Richemont and Swatch Group shares rose on Tuesday, after U.S. President Donald Trump said he was working with Switzerland on a deal to lower the 39% tariff rate it faces on exports.】

item.title: 独家报道：壳牌在纽约最高法院挑战风险投资公司的仲裁决定
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份法律文件，在竞争对手英国石油公司（BP）赢得类似的价值 10 多亿美元的仲裁案几周后，壳牌在纽约最高法院对其在与美国液化天然气生产商 Venture Global 的仲裁案中的败诉提出质疑。【原文：Shell has challenged its defeat in an arbitration case against U.S. liquefied natural gas producer Venture Global in the New York Supreme Court, according to a legal filing seen by Reuters, weeks after rival BP won a similar $1 billion-plus arbitration.】

item.title: 保时捷股份公司危机影响保时捷 SE 盈利
item.description: 保时捷控股公司周二表示，豪华汽车制造商保时捷公司（Porsche AG）的危机打击了第一大股东保时捷股份公司（Porsche SE）今年前九个月的盈利，调整后的税后利润下降了三分之一以上。【原文：A crisis at luxury carmaker Porsche AG hit earnings at top shareholder Porsche SE in the first nine months of the year, with adjusted profit after tax falling by over a third, the holding company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 沃达丰八年来首次增加股息
item.description: 在德国恢复增长帮助这家欧洲移动和宽带运营商上调盈利前景后，沃达丰的股东将获得八年来首次股息增长的回报。【原文：Vodafone's shareholders will be rewarded with the first dividend increase in eight years after a return to growth in Germany helped the European mobile and broadband operator upgrade its earnings outlook.】

item.title: 中国将为美国公司提供新的投资机会
item.description: 商务部周二发表声明称，中国高级贸易谈判代表李成钢表示，中国将继续推动扩大市场准入，特别是在服务业领域，这将为包括美国在内的企业带来新的投资机会。【原文：China will continue to promote the expansion of market access, particularly in the service sector, which will bring new investment opportunities to companies including those from the United States, senior Chinese trade negotiator Li Chenggang said, according to a statement from the Ministry of Commerce on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，埃利奥特持有丰田工业近 5%的股份
item.description: 彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道称，激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）已将其在丰田工业公司的持股比例增至近 5%。【原文：Activist investor Elliott Investment Management has increased its stake in Toyota Industries to almost 5%, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】
